data.label: RxFFmpeg
data.description: RxFFmpeg 是基于 ( FFmpeg 4.0 + X264 + mp3lame + fdk-aac + opencore-amr + openssl ) 编译的适用于 Android 平台的音视频编辑、视频剪辑的快速处理框架，包含以下功能：视频拼接，转码，压缩，裁剪，片头片尾，分离音视频，变速，添加静态贴纸和gif动态贴纸，添加字幕，添加滤镜，添加背景音乐，加速减速视频，倒放音视频，音频裁剪，变声，混音，图片合成视频，视频解码图片，抖音首页，视频播放器及支持 OpenSSL https 等主流特色功能。

data.label: RxFFmpeg
data.description: RxFFmpeg is a fast processing framework for audio-video editing and video clipping on the Android platform, compiled based on (FFmpeg 4.0 + X264 + mp3lame + fdk-aac + opencore-amr + openssl). It includes the following functions: video splicing, transcoding, compression, cropping, intro and outro, audio-video separation, speed change, adding static stickers and gif dynamic stickers, adding subtitles, adding filters, adding background music, speeding up and slowing down video, reversing audio-video, audio cropping, changing voice, mixing, image synthesis video, video decoding image, Douyin homepage, video player, and support for OpenSSL https and other mainstream features.
